attributes.action: Follow the lead of the Greek government and shut down our equally wasteful and bloated Public broadcasting service - the BBC.
attributes.additional_details: In these days of austerity it is an offensive affront to licence tax payers (who have no option but to pay - even if they are technologically incapable of tuning in to the BBC channels) to have to watch government cronies lauding the high life with our money, while cutting back the money being spent on programme making.
